column2: ENGLISH
There are rulers in the world who are sadly neglecting the laws that Jesus himself gave to the Holy Church.
The Pope is upset with our law of Free Investiture. The Holy Father is asking us to change it to comply with Church Doctrine.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has accepted God's will, and is now allowing Papal appointments of Bishops.
The Devil is acting through [From.GetTitledFirstName]. That can be the only reason for [From.GetHerHis] stubborn refusal of God's will.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has sent donations to the Church. This will be needed for the holy work.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has argued convincingly, on theological grounds, why [From.GetHerHis] realm should be exempt from Papal Law.
The Kings and Emperors refuse to follow the Law of God. It is up to the servants of Christ to rectify this.
An emissary is visiting us from the Papacy, giving us gifts and demanding our allegiance to the Throne of St. Peter
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has been approached by the Pope, and is clearly disregarding our lawful rights.
The Kings and Emperors refuse to follow the Law of God. However, any nobleman anointed by God's servants can become a rightful King.
The Holy Father is asking us to replace our liege, and is giving us the divine right to do so.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] is a rebel and a traitor. The false sweet words of the false pope has swayed [From.GetHerHim].
Invite them to follow the true doctrines
We always follow the divine will.
There will be other ways.
We can wait for [From.GetHerHim] to change the laws.
God moves in mysterious ways.
Demand allegiance to the Throne of St. Peter
God is great!
Will no one rid me of this turbulent priest?
Grant the vassal a legal claim to the title.
God save the Pope!
[From.GetSheHeCap] will pay for this!
God will punish them later...
I rule in MY realm!
Let it slide
My liege is my sovereign
That is a bad idea...
I am loyal to my liege!
Some gold to the church will silence them.
Decline on Theological Grounds
[This.GetTitledFirstName] will read the papal letter.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] will listen to the demands of The Holy Father
Our mortal liege will hear of this.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] will evaluate our proposal
Our Liege will hear of this.
